snippet.title: Thor: War of Tapnarok Official Trailer
snippet.description:
After the dust of Ragnarok settled, Loki, God of Mischief has taken Heimdall's Crystal Staff and intends to bring war upon Asgard.  Summoning monsters from all the Nine Realms, they are now at the gates and Tapnarok is almost upon us. 

It is your duty as Thor, Son of Odin, King of Asgard and true ruler of all the nine realms to defend your home from the invasion.

Marvel at the might of Thor as he fights the countless monsters with the help from his trusted allies such as Valkyrie, Freyja, Tyr, and even The All-Father Himself, Odin.

* Simple Tap tap gameplay that will keep you going!
* Unique ability to snipe for the enemy’s weakness
* Unlock Allies and use their skills to defend Asgard
* Upgrade and Evolve Allies to realise their potential
* Use many of Thor’s Power-Ups for explosive gameplay
* Summon 37 of Asgard's most powerful Treasures
* Explore the beautiful and wondrous Nine Realms
* Engage in a compelling storyline and flashy graphics
* Summon All-Father Odin to fight by your side.
* … And many more!

The fate of Asgard is in your hands. It is time to take up Mjolnir and defend the realm!

Google Play Early Access coming soon, only for the first 10,000 downloads.
